title: `SpatialData`
code: library(ggplot2) library(patchwork) library(ggnewscale) library(SpatialData)

title: `SpatialData`
code: tf = tempfile() dir.create(tf) merpath = unzip_merfish_demo(destination=tf) x = readSpatialData(merpath)

title: `SpatialData`
code: table(x) ## class: SingleCellExperiment  ## dim: 268 2389  ## metadata(1): spatialdata_attrs ## assays(1): X ## rownames(268): 1700022I11Rik 1810046K07Rik ... Wnt7b Zfp804b ## rowData names(0): ## colnames(2389): 0 1 ... 2397 2398 ## colData names(2): cell_id region ## reducedDimNames(0): ## mainExpName: NULL ## altExpNames(0): # object should behave like a names list x$shapes$anatomical # character vector shapeNames(x)  # list of elements in layer shapes(x)  # single element shape(x, i=1) # default shape(x, i="single_molecule") # get (meta)data from an element # (arrow for point/shape, ZarrArray for label/image) data(shape(x))  # .zattrs, currently just rendered as fromJSON would meta(shape(x))

title: `SpatialData`
code: i <- sample(length(p <- point(x)), 2e3) point(x, "2k") <- p[i] plotSpatialData() +     plotImage(x) +     plotPoint(x, i="2k", c="cell_type", s=0.2) +     new_scale_color() +     plotShape(x, i="anatomical") +     scale_color_manual(values=hcl.colors(6, "Spectral")) plotSpatialData() +     plotShape(x, i=2, c="black", f=NA) +     scale_size_continuous(range=c(0, 3))

title: `SpatialData`
code: #x <- file.path("..", "inst", "extdata", "mibitof.zarr") #(x <- readSpatialData(x)) td = tempfile() dir.create(td) mibipath = unzip_spd_demo(zipname="mibitof.zip", destination=td) x = readSpatialData(mibipath) lapply(seq(3), \(i) {     plotSpatialData() +          plotImage(x, i) +          new_scale_fill() +         plotLabel(x, i, c="Cluster", a=0.2) }) |> wrap_plots(nrow=1) + plot_layout(guides="collect")

title: `SpatialData`
code: td = tempfile() dir.create(td) vishdpath = unzip_spd_demo(zipname="visium_hd_3.0.0_io.zip", destination=td) (x <- readSpatialData(vishdpath, tables=3)) ## class: SpatialData ## images(4): Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_cytassist_image ##   Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_full_image ##   Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_hires_image ##   Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_lowres_image ## labels(0): ## shapes(3): Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_square_002um ##   Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_square_008um ##   Visium_HD_Mouse_Small_Intestine_square_016um ## points(0): ## tables(1): square_016um plotSpatialData() + plotImage(x, 4)

code: td = tempfile()  dir.create(td) pa = unzip_spd_demo(zipname="visium_associated_xenium_io_aligned.zip", dest=td) ali =readSpatialData(pa) ali ## class: SpatialData ## images(3): CytAssist_FFPE_Human_Breast_Cancer_full_image ##   CytAssist_FFPE_Human_Breast_Cancer_hires_image ##   CytAssist_FFPE_Human_Breast_Cancer_lowres_image ## labels(0): ## shapes(1): CytAssist_FFPE_Human_Breast_Cancer ## points(0): ## tables(1): table

title: The `PointFrame` class — PointFrame
code: tf = tempfile() dir.create(tf) base <- unzip_merfish_demo(tf) #> returning path to cached zip x <- file.path(base, "points", "single_molecule") (p <- readPoint(x)) #> class: PointFrame #> count: 3714642  #> data(3): x y cell_type  head(as.data.frame(data(p))) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>       x     y cell_type    `__null_dask_index__` #>   <dbl> <dbl> <fct>                        <int> #> 1 1279. 6021. outside_VISp                     0 #> 2 1327. 6024. outside_VISp                     1 #> 3 1292. 6059. outside_VISp                     2 #> 4 1301. 6098. outside_VISp                     3 #> 5 1232. 6103. outside_VISp                     4 #> 6 1239. 6112. outside_VISp                     5 (q <- dplyr::filter(p, cell_type == "VISp_wm")) #> class: PointFrame #> count: 45634  #> data(3): x y cell_type plotPoint(q, c="x", s=0.2)

title: The `ShapeFrame` class — ShapeFrame
code: tf = tempfile() dir.create(tf) base <- unzip_merfish_demo(tf) #> returning path to cached zip y <- file.path(base, "shapes", "cells") (s <- readShape(y)) #> class: ShapeFrame #> count: 2389  #> data(3): geometry radius cell_id plot(sf::st_as_sf(data(s)), cex=0.2)   y <- file.path(base, "shapes", "anatomical") (s <- readShape(y)) #> class: ShapeFrame #> count: 6  #> data(1): geometry plot(sf::st_as_sf(data(s)), cex=0.2)

title: Reading `SpatialData` — readSpatialData
code: readImage(x)  readLabel(x)  readPoint(x)  readShape(x)  readTable(x)  readSpatialData(   x,   images = NULL,   labels = NULL,   points = NULL,   shapes = NULL,   tables = NULL )

title: Reading `SpatialData` — readSpatialData
text: x readImage/Label/Point/Shape/Table, path SpatialData element. readSpatialData, path SpatialData-.zarr store. images, labels, points, shapes, tables Control elements read layer. default, NULL, reads elements; alternatively, may FALSE skip layer, integer vector specifying elements read.

code: unzip_spd_demo(   zipname = "mibitof.zip",   destination,   cache = BiocFileCache::BiocFileCache(),   source )

title: unzip selected demo data to specified folder — unzip_spd_demo
text: zipname character(1) name zipped zarr archive found Bioconductor OSN bucket destination character(1) path folder must exist cache defaults BiocFileCache::BiocFileCache(), serve destination source source character(1) one "biocOSN", "sandbox", "local"

title: unzip selected demo data to specified folder — unzip_spd_demo
unzip selected demo data to specified folder — unzip_spd_demo
code: tf = tempfile() dir.create(tf) pa = unzip_spd_demo(zipname="mibitof.zip", destination=tf, source="biocOSN") #> returning path to cached zip dir(pa, full.names=TRUE) #> [1] "/var/folders/n4/p9th81md60s8nv12yv40sv8m0000gp/T//Rtmpf5ihcA/file3b805c5c5596/data.zarr/images"    #> [2] "/var/folders/n4/p9th81md60s8nv12yv40sv8m0000gp/T//Rtmpf5ihcA/file3b805c5c5596/data.zarr/labels"    #> [3] "/var/folders/n4/p9th81md60s8nv12yv40sv8m0000gp/T//Rtmpf5ihcA/file3b805c5c5596/data.zarr/tables"    #> [4] "/var/folders/n4/p9th81md60s8nv12yv40sv8m0000gp/T//Rtmpf5ihcA/file3b805c5c5596/data.zarr/zmetadata"
